Related repos

  • Integrates data sources for transformation and visualization
  • open-source BI tool for easy data analysis and dashboards
  • Integrated data platform combining spreadsheets and SQL
  • Automates exploratory data analysis and visualization with AI, supports natural language queries, and generates multi-dimensional charts
  • Data science IDE for coding and data exploration in R and Python
  • Platform for cataloging and managing metadata across data systems
  • open source BI and data viz system originally built at Yandex
  • Toolkit for data visualization apps
  • AI tool for chatting with and analyzing your data using natural language; works with files and databases, keeps data on your device
